analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
analyzed: sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā adukkhamasukhā vedanā

original: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sukhā vedanā dukkhato diṭṭhā hoti, dukkhā vedanā sallato diṭṭhā hoti, adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato diṭṭhā hoti;
analyzed: yatas kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno sukhā vedanā dukkhataḥ diṭṭhā hoti dukkhā vedanā sallataḥ diṭṭhā hoti adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccataḥ diṭṭhā hoti

original: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu ariyo sammaddaso acchecchi, taṇhaṁ, vivattayi saṁyojanaṁ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā’”ti.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu ariyaḥ sammaddasaḥ dukkhassa ati
sa veḥ yoga atigaḥ muni iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
